alert.note: Alert for Hale; Swisher (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued May 23 at 9:06PM CDT until May 23 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR NORTHEASTERN HALE AND SOUTH CENTRAL SWISHER COUNTIES... At 906 PM CDT, local law enforcement reported FK 788 north of Plainview and the service roads along Interstate 27 were flooded. Between 5 and 7 inches of rain have fallen. The heavy rain was moving out of the warning area, but Flash flooding is already occurring and will remain for some time. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... mainly rural areas of Northeastern Hale and South Central Swisher Counties FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
